pr_title: Update manual array to collections copy method.

timeline.message:
Update manual array to collections copy method.

Replace instances of copying of array contents to a collection where
each element is added individually using a for loop with a call to
Collection.addAll().

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure this keeps the same behaviour. The == will test if the passed arrays are the same reference.  Replacing with Arrays.equals is also going to check if the contents are the same.  This would make the rest of the test redundant - and from the code comments is trying to optimize the comparison.
timeline.author: EdColeman

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the catch Ed! I will revert that change. It didn't really go with the rest of the changes anyway.
replies.author: jmark99

timeline.message:
Update manual array to colletions copy method.

Reverted an array equality check back to its original form.

timeline.bodyText: This is a handy method, I didn't know it existed.
timeline.author: keith-turner
